overview:
Shane Pearson is responsible for product development, marketing and sales at Gnip, Inc., which provides an on-demand extensible messaging platform for accessing, filtering and integrating business and social data from across the Internet.

Prior to his current role, Shane spent eight years at BEA Systems, where most recently he was the Vice President, Marketing and Product Management. While at BEA, Shane led efforts for business and product development across all areas of the business including application servers, enterprise portals, collaboration, search, and business process management .

Prior to his time at BEA, Shane worked at Vignette Corporation as a member of the product management team and also worked for SAP AG in a consulting and product management capacity where he contributed to the development of vertical industry solution accelerators and SAP CRM products.

Shane holds a Bachelor in Science degree in Industrial Management and Master of Science degree in Management from Purdue University.
